boardAPI.battleshipInterface

Interface BattleshipListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BattleshipApplet, BoardPanel, StatusPanel

    public interface BattleshipListener
    The interface for a BattleshipListener.

    Allows the implementing class to receive events from a BattleshipBoard.

    Since:
    2015-09-24
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Jason Carlson (jccarlson @ miners.utep.edu)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void gameOver(BattleshipEvent e)
      Method called when the game is over (all ships sunk).
      void shipMoved(BattleshipEvent e)
      Method called when a ship is moved or placed.
      void shotFired(BattleshipEvent e)
      Method Called when a shot is fired at the board.

    • Method Detail

      • shotFired

        void shotFired(BattleshipEvent e)
        Method Called when a shot is fired at the board.
        Parameters:
        e - A BattleshipEvent which will contain the code for HIT, MISS, or INVALID and possibly SHIP_SUNK. Will contain row and col and if SHIP_SUNK will contain the sunken Ship.

      • gameOver

        void gameOver(BattleshipEvent e)
        Method called when the game is over (all ships sunk).
        Parameters:
        e - A BattleshipEvent which will contain the code for GAME_OVER.

      • shipMoved

        void shipMoved(BattleshipEvent e)
        Method called when a ship is moved or placed. If moved, will have prevShip where the ship used to be and ship where it is now. If placed for the first time, prevShip will be null.
        Parameters:
        e - A BattleshipEvent which will contain the code for SHIP_MOVED and the Ship.
